title: Jelly Donut Diet
content:
Work in progress.

Need to definitely refine the &, ? and a few others. Let me know if anything else stands out as odd or not be working with the other characters.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140714003254im_/http:/typophile.com/files/type_spec_4436.jpg)
author: whereiputstuff

comments.content:
The corners all look like they're "punked" a little, but that could be an optical illusion caused by the color contrast of the sample.

It's hard to tell the H from the N, especially at small sizes. Consider making the notches on the H wider.
